DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this study is to evaluate efficacy and safety of ALS-L1023 tablet in patients with abdominal obesity of metabolic syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of ALS-L1023 in Patients With Abdominal Obesity of Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Aged between 20 and 64 years(Both genders) more than 2 among components of the metabolic syndrome Triglyceride >= 150mg/dL HDLD: Women < 50mg/dL or Men < 40mg/dL Hypertension: Systolic blood pressure >= 130mmHg or Diastolic blood pressure >= 85mmHg Hyperglycemia: fasting plasma glucose >= 100 mg/dL Informed consent awarding Alcohol or any drug abuse Any investigational medication during the preceding 3 months
